description: After days of stand-off the passengers, who include children, will be taken into quarantine in Sicily.
title: Italy migrant crisis: 180 migrants allowed off rescue ship
title_page: Italy migrant crisis: 180 migrants allowed off rescue ship - BBC News
maintext: The UN's refugee agency, UNHCR, says that more than 24,000 refugees and migrants arrived in Europe by sea during the first six months of this year, although it is thought that warmer weather during summer could lead to an increase in the number of attempts.
